io.netty.handler.codec.smtp

Class SmtpRequests

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.codec.smtp.SmtpRequests

  • @UnstableApi
public final class SmtpRequests
extends Object
    Provides utility methods to create SmtpRequests.
